quote: A tightness in my chest came out of nowhere. As I listened to Amanda reassure my brother, I wanted to pull her into my arms and cry. How damn crazy was that? This girl was making me a nutcase.
quote_letters: A TIGHTNESS IN MY CHEST CAME OUT OF NOWHERE AS I LISTENED TO AMANDA REASSURE MY BROTHER I WANTED TO PULL HER INTO MY ARMS AND CRY HOW DAMN CRAZY WAS THAT THIS GIRL WAS MAKING ME A NUTCASE
